Title: c.1930s AMERICAN PEDOMETER Co. Manual Pedometer - 15s A.P. Co. - AS-IS
Description: Date & Model: Vintage (c.1930s): Up for your consideration is this Vintage ESTATE "American Pedometer Co." (A.P. Co.), 15s "Open Face", Manual Pedometer (Style-Unknown); Yes, this "American Pedometer Co." Manual Pedometer is an AS-IS "Estate Acquisition", largely as I haven't the foggiest idea how it works, winds, moves, etc (Style No. & Serial No. "Unknown"). Measurements: 2 & 5/8ths-of-an-Inch (Base-to-Bale); 1.75" in Diameter; Half-Inch deep. Runs: DOES NOT RUN (OR I don't know how to enable it to run, OR Both!); However this "American Pedometer Co." Manual Pedometer's Movement appears VERY Clean and Complete as photographed above; Again, this Antique "American Pedometer Co." Manual Pedometer is being sold "As-Is", with a Professional Servicing/Cleaning required; I DO NOT know what repairs are necessary to keep this Manual Pedometer running accurately. Case: "Very Good": As photographed above, a relatively clean "Open Face" Silver-Plated Chrome Case BEST described as decisively "Art Deco" in terms of Stylized Design; That IS this "American Pedometer Co." Manual Pedometer's case's original patina, we have NOT attempted to clean or polish it; NO Dings, NO Dents, NO Monograms. Crystal: "Poor-to-Fair"; Displaying "More Moderate" wear and oxidation commensurate with Age, Use & Jewelry Box Storage; DEFINITELY Requires a Cleaning, perhaps a replacement. Dial: "Very Good": A relatively clean "American Pedometer Co." dial displaying LIGHT cosmetic wear commensurate with Age, GENTLE Use and several decades of Jewelry Box Storage; Additionally, this "American Pedometer Co." Dial features fancier "Arabic Numerals", ONE Chronograph, and maintains BOTH of its "Spade-Shaped" Hands; It will require a cleaning. ***** Spectacular Personal Indulgence or Memorable Gift *****

ReturnPolicy.Description: Returns gladly accepted always (In terms of Condition Reporting, Sizing or technology mistakes or accidental misrepresentations CAN happen) --- The ONLY humble requirement we ask is that the item be returned to us in the same condition we've shipped it to you :-)
